cont.entity_a: Signal strength was excellent through multiple walls.
Serious incompatibility issues with some devices. Connection issues with PlayStation 3 and Cingular 8525. Intermittent problems with Toshiba Tecra M5 and Dell M700.
cont.entity_b: Performs well with multiple devices including gaming consoles.

cont.entity_a: Router was unreliable, dropping connections frequently. Some units experienced frequent connection drops. Router stopped working after a month.
cont.entity_b: Extremely stable. Reliable setup with D-Link DWL-G550 wireless PCI Card. Handles many connections without slowing down.
Reliable setup with D-Link DWL-G550 wireless PCI Card.

cont.entity_a: Firmware update solved initial setup problems. Firmware upgrade was necessary to fix connection drops. Firmware update was necessary for stable wireless operation. Firmware was buggy.
cont.entity_b: Requires firmware update for optimal Xbox Live performance. Works well with X-Box Live and Nintendo Wi-Fi after firmware upgrade.

cont.entity_a: Customer service was unhelpful and call was dropped. Customer support was generally helpful but varied in expertise.
cont.entity_b: Tech support was helpful in resolving initial setup issues.

cont.entity_a: Improved signal and performance significantly with SRX400 enhanced cards. Router increased speed significantly with compatible PCI card.
cont.entity_b: Wireless signal strength is strong and stable. Fast and reliable with a solid signal.
Router interface is user-friendly with great features. Offers advanced settings and supports VIOP nicely.
Supports strong WiFi encryption for secure connections.
Offers gigabit LAN speeds and stable wireless connection.
Overheating issues when stacked under another device.
